resources.title: Free Figma Advanced Course: Become a Figma Pro
resources.description: An advanced, project-based Figma course focused on building responsive, production-ready UI. Learn AI-assisted workflows, Auto Layout mastery, components, variants, animations, and visual effects while creating a complete, portfolio-ready app using professional UX/UI practices.
learningObjectives: Use AI-powered features in Figma to accelerate layout creation, content generation, and interactions
Design complex, responsive layouts using Auto Layout, constraints, and grids
Build scalable components, variables, and multi-dimensional variants
Apply advanced visual effects, typography techniques, and layout polish
Create responsive navigation, cards, and grid-based UI through hands-on projects
Implement animations and interactions within components and variants
Manage styles, spacing systems, and assets using professional Figma workflows
Produce a complete, portfolio-ready app from brief to final design
targetAudience: UX and UI designers with basic Figma knowledge
Product designers seeking advanced responsive design skills
Designers transitioning from static layouts to scalable design systems
Design teams wanting to improve Figma efficiency and consistency
